name: Johnathon and Chicago Detective Agency
description:
You're an intern at a detective agency and you do all sorts of important mystery solving. Quick! There's no time for dilly dallying, there's something strange afoot in town...

Use your arrow keys to interact with people in town (they're really talkative...), soothe Chicago, complete tasks, and do your sleuthing thing (whatever that means)

~ 20 mins play time (give or take a few tangent conversations)

NOTE: This is only the beta version of the game so it only covers about half of what's planned!

Everything was made with bitsy and borksy.

All music belongs to Louie Zong! You can find his tunes here: https://louiezong.bandcamp.com/
